abstract: Even as 10 banks returned their slice of the financial bailout, the troubles facing smaller regional U.S. banks seemed to build.
snippet: Even as 10 banks returned their slice of the financial bailout, the troubles facing smaller regional U.S. banks seemed to build.
lead_paragraph: At 9:39 a.m. Wednesday, an operations manager in JPMorgan Chase’s Tampa offices pushed a button and wired $25 billion in taxpayer money back to Washington. With that transfer and others like it across the country, 10 banks returned their slice of the financial bailout, freeing themselves from the stigma of a government lifeline and the increased oversight that went with it.

headline.main: Amid TARP Exits, S.& P. Cuts Bank Ratings

abstract: JPMorgan Chase said it hired a senior Merrill Lynch deal-maker as its new vice chairman of mergers and acquisitions, the latest in a reshuffling of investment banking ranks.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase said it hired a senior Merrill Lynch deal-maker as its new vice chairman of mergers and acquisitions, the latest in a reshuffling of investment banking ranks.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase said Thursday that it had hired a senior Merrill Lynch deal maker as its new vice chairman of mergers and acquisitions, the latest in a reshuffling of the investment banking ranks since the onset of the financial crisis.

headline.main: JPMorgan Hires Senior Merrill Deal Maker
